Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

a mod would be nice that provides a 1,25m Thust-Vectoring-Nozzle you can snap below an SRB to give it some degrees of Gimbal.

Would be great to have this part for Shuttle builds.

Allthough i am not sure if this Version of the mod is even possible.

It might be easier to just give the stockmodel of the SRB's some degrees of gimbal.

I got my Idea (AFT Skirt) from this Image of a SpaceShuttle-Booster:

Edited October 15, 2015 by MalfunctionM1Ke

There was a mod that let you give parts upgrades along the tech tree but I can't for the life of me find it.

anyway if it's found you can use it to give the same old SRB's gimbals without adding to the part catalog.

Other wise you could just MM patch gimbals onto the SRB's from the start like so


@PART[solidBooster1-1]
{
	MODULE
	{
		name = ModuleGimbal
		gimbalTransformName = thrustTransform
		gimbalRange = 1
	}
}

I personally see no shame in it kerbal's balance is in desperate need of attention
You could very easily copy the gimbal from the LV-T45 to the Kickback so it has a gimbal, or use a modulemanager config.
